segments.text: Come in , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good afternoon , Mrs Smith .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good afternoon . Have a seat , please . You are Mr . Sun ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Yes , I am Dunlin .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have read your resume . I know you have worked for 3 years . Why did you choose to major in mechanical engineering ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Many factors led me to major in mechanical engineering . The most important factor is I like tinkering with machines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you primarily interested in about mechanical engineering ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like designing products , and one of my designs received an award . Moreover , I am familiar with CAD . But I can do any mechanic well if I am employed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why did you decide to apply for this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your company has a very good reputation , and I am very interested in the field your company is in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think determines an employee's progress in a company such as ours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Interpersonal and technical skills .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have several applicants for this position . Why do you think you are the person we should choose ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have the abilities , qualities and experience that you requested in your job advert , for example I have three years experience in designing products and I got leadership experience while serving the college student union as president .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds very good . How do you see your career development ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After a few years of gaining experience in the company and furthering my professional qualifications I'd like to put my experience and skills to use in management . I want to become a supervisor in your R & D department .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you anything to ask about the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Do you offer any opportunities for further study ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . If you undertake additional courses , provided these are approved , and you complete them successfully , you can claim back part , quite a large part , 75 % of the costs you incurred . Not just the fees , - traveling and other expenses too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , thank you very much , Mr . Sun . I'll let you know the result of the interview as soon as possible . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Mrs . Smith . I do hope the answer will be favorable . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S2
